definition: surname Wei/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1066-221 BC), located in present day Henan and Hebei Provinces
to guard/to protect/to defend/abbr. for 衛生|卫生, hygiene/health/abbr. for 衛生間|卫生间, toilet
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

sentences.english: I think we can buy sanitary towel.
sentences.chinese: 我想我們可以去買衛生巾。

sentences.english: The carrying case for dealing with transitional pads is key to succeeding here. And using the non-disposable menstrual cups can actually help with this.
sentences.chinese: 在這裏要討論的關鍵問題是怎樣處理使用過的衛生巾。

sentences.english: Every month, I seem to go through an endless number of disposal pads and tampons.
sentences.chinese: 每個月，我似乎都用去了無數的衛生巾和衛生棉。

sentences.english: It can produce sanitary napkin with air laid paper or fluffy pulp as absorbent material.
sentences.chinese: 可生產吸收體爲無塵紙或絨毛漿衛生巾。

sentences.english: The curve-edged hobbing cutter is used in producing rectangular wing sanitary napkin.
sentences.chinese: 曲線刃滾切刀是用來加工護翼衛生巾的專用刀具。

sentences.english: Change the napkins atleast twice a day.
sentences.chinese: 每天至少換兩次衛生巾。

definition: chamber pot/wooden pan used as toilet/toilet bowl
sterilized absorbent cotton wool (used for dressings or cleansing wounds)/sanitary napkin/tampon
to talk drivel/to make irresponsible remarks
